item.title: Minnesota senator alleges 'cover up' amid intensifying dispute over ICE shooting probe

item.title: New Jersey's longest serving state legislator and former governor Richard Codey dies
item.description: Richard "Dick" Codey, a former acting governor of New Jersey and the longest serving legislator in the state's history, died Sunday. He was 79.
